author: Staff Reporter
text: Members of the Dravidar Kazhagam staged a protest in front of the Coimbatore South Taluk office on Saturday demanding 27 per cent reservation for people from backward classes. Led by Secretary P. Mohan, they said that the Central Government should implement the 27 per cent reservation policy and the State Government should appoint those persons who were eligible for appointment as archakas by following the reservation policy. Around 40 persons participated in the protest.
title: DK cadre stage protest
